spaces.name: Private Voting System
spaces.description: A decentralized voting system with zero-knowledge proofs for privacy
spaces.longDescription: This system enables anonymous voting while ensuring vote integrity and preventing double voting. Uses zero-knowledge proofs to verify vote eligibility without revealing voter identity.

customPrograms.name: vote-verification
customPrograms.description: Custom program for verifying vote validity and preventing double voting

spaces.name: Anonymous Credentials
spaces.description: Identity verification without revealing personal information
spaces.longDescription: A system for proving identity attributes (age, nationality, etc.) without revealing the actual data. Perfect for KYC and age verification use cases.

customPrograms.name: credential-verification
customPrograms.description: Custom program for verifying credential attributes without revealing them

spaces.name: ZK Chess
spaces.description: Private chess games with verifiable moves
spaces.longDescription: Play chess without revealing your strategy while ensuring all moves are valid. Uses ZK proofs to verify move validity without exposing the game state.

customPrograms.name: chess-move-validator
customPrograms.description: Custom program for validating chess moves and game state

spaces.name: Private DEX
spaces.longDescription: A decentralized exchange that keeps trade amounts and participant identities private while ensuring fair price execution.

customPrograms.name: order-matching
customPrograms.description: Custom program for private order matching and execution

spaces.name: Private Social Graph
spaces.description: Social networking with privacy-preserving friend connections
spaces.longDescription: A social networking platform that allows users to prove they are connected to others without revealing their entire social graph. Perfect for private professional networking and connection verification.

customPrograms.name: graph-proof
customPrograms.description: Custom program for proving social connections without revealing the entire graph

spaces.name: Private ML Inference
spaces.longDescription: Run machine learning models on private data while proving the computation was done correctly. Enables privacy-preserving AI applications without revealing input data.

customPrograms.name: ml-inference
customPrograms.description: Custom program for private ML model inference and proof generation

spaces.name: Anonymous Reputation System
spaces.longDescription: A system that allows users to accumulate and prove their reputation scores across different platforms without linking their identities, using zero-knowledge proofs.

customPrograms.name: reputation-proof
customPrograms.description: Custom program for aggregating and proving reputation scores

spaces.name: Zero-Knowledge Auctions
spaces.description: Private bidding system with verifiable outcomes
spaces.longDescription: A sealed-bid auction system where bids remain private until the auction ends, with zero-knowledge proofs ensuring fair price discovery and winner selection.

customPrograms.name: auction-resolver
customPrograms.description: Custom program for private bid processing and winner selection

spaces.name: Private Messaging Protocol
spaces.description: End-to-end encrypted messaging with proof of delivery
spaces.longDescription: A messaging system that provides end-to-end encryption with zero-knowledge proofs for message delivery and reading receipts, without compromising metadata privacy.

customPrograms.name: message-proof
customPrograms.description: Custom program for proving message delivery and receipt
